data.text: @CraigDeLuz @USATODAY Please explain it clearly. If it is incorrect, I would like to correct it
@wwcummings @USATODAY The fact that you don’t get the error is truly sad.
@wwcummings @USATODAY Just googled it... The headline hasn't changed. https://t.co/2Oz9qlUa9Y

@wwcummings @USATODAY Thank you for the correction. But you have to admit that the original headline, implied the exact opposite. It's sad that it was only changed after thousands read it immediately after the shooting.

@CraigDeLuz @USATODAY Not sure I follow you. The headline in the tweet you shared says exactly that. Headline was later updated to reflect that a law which would have banned possession, not just manufacture or purchase, was under injunction. Nothing fake about it.
